item.title: Evelyn add a quote by Bernard M. Baruch
item.description: "Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind." -- Bernard M. Baruch

item.title: Evelyn add a quote by William W. Purkey
item.description: "You've gotta dance like there's nobody watching, Love like you'll never be hurt, Sing like there's nobody listening, And live like it's heaven on earth." -- William W. Purkey

item.title: Evelyn add a quote by Eleanor Roosevelt
item.description: "No one can make you feel inferior without your consent." -- Eleanor Roosevelt

item.title: Evelyn add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Be the change that you wish to see in the world." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Evelyn add a quote by Albert Camus
item.description: "Don't walk behind me; I may not lead. Don't walk in front of me; I may not follow. Just walk beside me and be my friend." -- Albert Camus

item.title: Evelyn add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Two things are infinite: the universe and human stupidity; and I'm not sure about the universe." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Evelyn add a quote by Gordon A. Eadie
item.description: "If you don't stand for something you will fall for anything." -- Gordon A. Eadie

item.title: Evelyn add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "The fool doth think he is wise, but the wise man knows himself to be a fool." -- William Shakespeare

item.title: Evelyn add a quote by Elie Wiesel
item.description: "The opposite of love is not hate, it's indifference. The opposite of art is not ugliness, it's indifference. The opposite of faith is not heresy, it's indifference. And the opposite of life is not death, it's indifference." -- Elie Wiesel

item.title: Evelyn add a quote by Allen Saunders
item.description: "Life is what happens to you while you're busy making other plans." -- Allen Saunders

item.title: Evelyn add a quote by Martin Luther King Jr.
item.description: "Darkness cannot drive out darkness: only light can do that. Hate cannot drive out hate: only love can do that." -- Martin Luther King Jr.

item.title: Evelyn add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Live as if you were to die tomorrow. Learn as if you were to live forever." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Evelyn add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "That which does not kill us makes us stronger." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Evelyn add a quote by Miss Piggy
item.description: "Beauty is in the eye of the beholder and it may be necessary from time to time to give a stupid or misinformed beholder a black eye." -- Miss Piggy

item.title: Evelyn add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Evelyn add a quote by Mae West
item.description: "You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough." -- Mae West

item.title: Evelyn add a quote by A.A. Milne
Evelyn add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Logic will get you from A to Z; imagination will get you everywhere." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Evelyn add a quote by Narcotics Anonymous
item.description: "Insanity is doing the same thing, over and over again, but expecting different results." -- Narcotics Anonymous

item.title: Evelyn add a quote by Alfred Lord Tennyson
item.description: "Tis better to have loved and lost Than never to have loved at all." -- Alfred Lord Tennyson

item.title: Evelyn add a quote by Daphne Rae
item.description: "I have found the paradox, that if you love until it hurts, there can be no more hurt, only more love." -- Daphne Rae

item.title: Evelyn add a quote by Pablo Neruda
item.description: "I love you without knowing how, or when, or from where. I love you simply, without problems or pride: I love you in this way because I do not know any other way of loving but this, in which there is no I or you, so intimate that your hand upon my chest is my hand, so intimate that when I fall asleep your eyes close." -- Pablo Neruda

item.title: Evelyn add a quote by Virginia Woolf
item.description: "One cannot think well, love well, sleep well, if one has not dined well." -- Virginia Woolf

item.title: Evelyn add a quote by E.B. White
item.description: "It is not often that someone comes along who is a true friend and a good writer." -- E.B. White

item.title: Evelyn add a quote by A.A. Milne
item.description: "If ever there is tomorrow when we're not together... there is something you must always remember. You are braver than you believe, stronger than you seem, and smarter than you think. But the most important thing is, even if we're apart... I'll always be with you." -- A.A. Milne

item.title: Evelyn add a quote by A.A. Milne
item.description: "I do remember, and then when I try to remember, I forget." -- A.A. Milne

item.title: Evelyn add a quote by A.A. Milne
item.description: "If you live to be a hundred, I want to live to be a hundred minus one day so I never have to live without you." -- A.A. Milne
